personal_information.name: Personal Information of Third Party
warnings: This request involves third-party personal information (Section 8(1)(j))
You must demonstrate public interest that outweighs privacy concerns
Request may be denied unless larger public interest is shown

ongoing_investigation.name: Information Related to Ongoing Investigation
ongoing_investigation.processing_notes: May be rejected if investigation is active
warnings: Information that would impede investigation process is exempt (Section 8(1)(h))
This request may be denied if investigation is ongoing
Consider requesting after investigation is completed

commercial_confidence.name: Trade Secrets & Commercial Confidence
commercial_confidence.processing_notes: Section 11 third-party notice will be issued
warnings: Trade secrets and commercial confidence are protected (Section 8(1)(d))
Third party will be notified and given opportunity to object (Section 11)
Disclosure decision will be made after considering third-party objections

national_security.name: Information Affecting National Security
national_security.processing_notes: Likely to be rejected - highest exemption level
warnings: Information affecting sovereignty, integrity, or security is exempt (Section 8(1)(a))
This category has the strongest exemption under RTI Act
Request will likely be denied unless it pertains to corruption or human rights violations
national_security.block_message: This information category is highly likely to be exempt. Consider narrowing your request to non-sensitive aspects.

cabinet_papers.name: Cabinet Papers & Policy Decisions
cabinet_papers.processing_notes: Exempt for 20 years from date of decision
warnings: Cabinet papers are exempt under Section 8(1)(i)
Information older than 20 years may be available
You can request factual reports or analysis, but not cabinet deliberations

court_proceedings.name: Information Related to Court Proceedings
court_proceedings.processing_notes: May be exempt if it would impede fair trial
warnings: Information that would impede fair trial is exempt (Section 8(1)(h))
Public court records are generally available through court registries
Consider obtaining information directly from court if it's a public record

financial_information.name: Financial Records & Transactions
financial_information.processing_notes: Generally available unless exempted under other sections

infrastructure_projects.name: Infrastructure & Development Projects
infrastructure_projects.processing_notes: High public interest - strong case for disclosure

public_interest_override.text: I submit that disclosure of the requested information is in larger public interest and outweighs the privacy concerns under Section 8(1)(j) of the RTI Act, 2005, as it pertains to {public_interest_reason}.

investigation_disclaimer.text: I understand that if the requested information pertains to ongoing investigation, the same may be denied under Section 8(1)(h). However, I request that any non-exempt portion of the information be provided as per Section 10 of the RTI Act.

third_party_notice.text: I understand that third-party notice under Section 11 of the RTI Act may be issued for this request. I request that the process be expedited and any non-confidential information be provided meanwhile.

section_11_consent.text: I acknowledge that this request involves third-party commercial information. I request the Public Information Officer to issue notice under Section 11 to the concerned third party and proceed as per provisions of the RTI Act, 2005.

severability_request.text: In case any part of the requested information is exempt, I request that the non-exempt portions be provided separately as per Section 10 of the RTI Act, 2005.
